title: Radiant Diamond-Studded Gold Kada - Bangles (Kadiyam)
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmark) with Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability. Gold weight is approximately 51.210 grams and diamond weight is approximately 3.95 carats.
features: Contemporary design featuring a continuous pattern of geometric shapes (squares and diamonds) each delicately set with a sparkling brilliant-cut diamond. The rigid form of the Kada offers a modern twist on the classic Indian bangle. The precision setting and clean lines showcase impeccable craftsmanship.
colors: Lustrous Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: as well as modern parties and formal events. A beautiful addition to your 'pasupu kumkuma' collections.
description: This Kada combines the timeless allure of gold with the dazzling brilliance of diamonds, creating a piece that is both luxurious and versatile. Its modern design makes it suitable for everyday wear while still maintaining a touch of traditional elegance. The high purity gold and carefully selected diamonds ensure lasting value and enduring beauty. Features Hyderabadi polish for a superior finish. Suitable as a luxurious gift.
